Name: Million Dollar Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) & pineapple wedge on rim.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Serious, yet superbly smooth and a bit fluffy.
History: Some say this "Million Dollar Cocktail" was created around 1910 by Ngiam Tong Boon at The Long Bar, Raffles Hotel, Singapore. Others maintain it was created in 1894 by Louis Eppinger at The Grand Hotel, Yokohama, Japan. Our money is on Louis, the man many also credit for creating the Bamboo Cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Million Dollar Cocktail contains 217 calories
